website_summaries.verdict: If you experience irritation or discomfort while wearing shoes, this option offers instant soothing protection and keeps skin in great shape at the same time.
pros: Soft gel design reduces pain and pain caused by pressure and friction
Toe spreader helps maintain proper alignment
Enhanced with slow-release medical-grade mineral oil, vitamin E, and Aloe Vera
Adjustable for use on both feet
cons: May shift when worn without socks

customer_reviews.title: Really helps
customer_reviews.text: I have a of lot of pain in my feet. I can not wear flat shoes or be barefoot for more than 30 minutes with out pain. I was considering surgery because the pain is so bad. My husband purchased these for me and I have been wearing them whenever I have tennis shoes on. I am so surprised at how much they have helped! My pain has improved significantly. I do warn you, do not wear them constantly when you receive them. The first day I wore them all day and my toes got sore. Now, I wear them an hour or so a day and that is enough to give me pain relief.
customer_reviews.author: melissa cempella

customer_reviews.title: First of all this is a simple but great product and it works
customer_reviews.text: First of all this is a simple but great product and it works. When my bunion pain became unbearable, I started looking for affordable temporary solutions. I found this on Amazon and bought it because of the reviews. It works best when worn before pain has a chance to get started. If worn after pain, it takes a while for the effect to kick in. Easy to clean, easy to wear, definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Wow, pain is gone
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is WOW!. This gel guard works great, bunion pain is gone and on top of that, where I usually see a big bulge with a shoe on, this has been minimized so my foot looks more attractive. An added bonus! Would highly recommend this guard.
customer_reviews.author: Farmgirl

customer_reviews.title: Best option I've found so far
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for the last few months, and it's the most effective thing I've found for bunion pain relief. I run/walk 6+ miles/day and always wear it with my running/hiking shoes when active. It occasionally slips out of place, but much less so than other options I've tried. I've recommended it to several people.
customer_reviews.author: JesuisJJ

customer_reviews.title: I'm a believer
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and in good shape. I was skeptical, I'll be honest. I doubted these flimsy looking things would work for me because of the amount of time I have to be on my feet at work. I'm so glad I tried them. I don't go anywhere without these babies on. I have no pain when I walk, it's wicked cool, as I'd forgotten what it was like.
customer_reviews.author: Inked Fingers

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I was hoping for that the toe ...
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I was hoping for that the toe spreader section was a little wider. Not much separation between toes
customer_reviews.author: Sandra M. Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Well-made-great feel-does the job very well!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these bunion guards. They are very comfortable and definitely helping to a Line my toes. They also relieve the pain and pressure from walking and running. I had a small issue with one of the separators, and this company fixed it for me. They definitely stand behind their product and their customer service is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew D.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stays put, but the bunion guard has ripped off in just a month
customer_reviews.text: I like that these are so soft and comfortable, you can even wear them with slip on sandals. The only complaints I have is that the bunion guard gave me a little rash on my big toe when I first wore it, I think for it moving a bit and I have had it for about a month and the bunion guard has ripped off from the toe separator.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina G.

customer_reviews.title: Buy them, they work Great!!! Worth twice the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got them last night but great so far, soft easy to use, you can't even feel that you're wearing them. I've worn them with socks, in slippers and tall rubber rain boots, chasing a puppy outside and they stayed in place, and as I said, I couldn't feel them except to realize my feet felt better!!! I would recommend this product to anyone, any age, !!! I should add that I haven't tried wearing them barefoot but I believe they will stay on but the side on the bone(bunion) may flap a bit even so I would still highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gina S.

customer_reviews.title: They help with gout attacks as well
customer_reviews.text: I have used these spacers in the past. Normally I pay around 10 dollars for 1 so this 2 pack is a great deal. I use these when I have a gout attack in my big toe. The spacer keeps the tie straight and helps to minimize the discomfort and the flap on the side cushions the swollen inflamed joint. It make a difference for me in the length of an attack if I use this it’s typically several days less than if I don’t use them.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: It is very uncomfortable between my toes. You cannot wear pumps or any shoe that has any exposed foot area. You definitely cannot wear a boot with a narrow profile. It causes toe crowding in my shoes. It is not worth the cost. I have thrown away the packaging, so I can't return it. I don't recommend this product unless perhaps you are wearing totally enclosed shoes that are at least a size too large and super wide.
customer_reviews.author: Tjuana T.

customer_reviews.title: My bunions are mild but very painful and these guards really help
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't believe how fast the pain in my feet went away when I put these bunion guards on. Very lightweight. I wear them with tight socks and they fit well in my shoes. My bunions are mild but very painful and these guards really help.
customer_reviews.author: D. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: These work surprisingly well
customer_reviews.text: I don't appear to have a bunyon problem but I suddenly began experiencing pain there daily. I've used these for about a week now and am pleasantly surprised at how well they work. I only have pain when I wear a shoe with a narrow toe area or a heel more than an inch in height. So I've been wearing these on the days I wear that type of footwear and the pain is gone! They are comfortable. I plan to use great care in putting them on and taking them off, as they look like they could tear after a while. But they are definitely worth this price. I recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: OnlineShopperSCM

customer_reviews.title: Would be great if it was more durable
customer_reviews.text: This item had a nice feel, it was not cumbersome in foot ware. It only lasted me a few weeks in normal wear. That I found unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny B

customer_reviews.title: Relieves Bunion pain, but cramps the Small Toe
customer_reviews.text: These gel bunion guards are great at relieving bunion pain and protecting the protruding bone. The piece between the big toe is very soft and helps realign the bone. However, it fills up just enough of the shoe to cram the little toe in tightly against the side of the shoe. This caused me more pain to that small toe. I suppose it is all about the type of shoe you wear, so you will need to take that into consideration in choosing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L.

customer_reviews.title: It damaged  my foot!
customer_reviews.text: It broke and damaged my foot. I have big bruise and pain on top of my foot. I didn't realized that it broke I was @ work and thought the pain was related to realignment of the toe . I kept wearing it for my entire 12 h shift. Has been 2 weeks and the pain hasn't gone. I missed 2 days of work. Now I am limping and not able to bear weight on my left foot. I don't recommend it! I can't return the item, but that is besides of the point! I have worse issue to think about how to heal my foot.
customer_reviews.author: T. Z.

customer_reviews.title: Bunions Beware!
customer_reviews.text: For comfort and relief of Bunion pain this product works well. Bought for the wife after years of wearing ill fitted shoes for "Fashion Sake" now this remedy comes to play. Word to the Wise ! Don't let your girlfriend, fiancee or wife wear shoes for style sake that ruin their feet !...
customer_reviews.author: Rick Z.

customer_reviews.title: Best ones I've tried!
customer_reviews.text: I have a problem, hammer toe?, where my second toe crosses over my big toe and have tried several separators. This is by far my favorite. The pad on the side of my foot helps a lot and the divider stays in place until you take them off.just wish I could find some that would enable me to wear my sandals!!! 😢
customer_reviews.author: Linda Carrington

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: It does not fit pi hug toe. You need tape to keep it in place and when you remove the tape it damages the gel on toe spacer.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M. Godina

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe it, but my bunion has become less pronounced already after only one month! It does cause a bit of discomfort as it helps to bring the bones back into alignment, but wow, what a difference! AND... NO SURGERY!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Little Toe Gadgets~
customer_reviews.text: These little toe gadgets work okay, fine,.. do the job. It helps to keep the big toe more straight which lessens the pressure on where the bunion is forming. Also, lessons stress on the tendon that is being pulled on when the toe is turning inward,. ..(Ouch!)..
customer_reviews.author: S. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: So far, I have not had any problems with this gel toe separator. After I learned I was developing bunions, my podiatrist suggested orthotics, but they only did so much and the joint area around my big toes was still in pain. I had read through reviews of other toe separators on here and they were all bogus, except the reviews for this product. I've definitely noticed a pain decrease in my big toe joint area while wearing it and I like that's a cheaper prevenitive.
customer_reviews.author: Cha Cha Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Broken after using it for the first time.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product and it was broken after only one use. Unfortunately I have it delivered to a relative in Miami and had to wait a couple of weeks before he could bring it home, that's why I missed the devolution window.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No need to have surgery
customer_reviews.text: These little gadgets are wonderful. Finally , something comfortable and easy to use to keep my big toe from bothering toe number 2. It is especially helpful when I play golf....toe number 2 usually takes a beating after I play, but not anymore!
customer_reviews.author: E. Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases I have ever made!
customer_reviews.text: I looked at it when I received it and had many doubts, but I tried it because I needed relief from the fire and pain caused from a bunion. It was almost immediate relief! I couldn't believe it. I had been contemplating surgery to eliminate the bunion and the pain associated with it, but with the guard I'm not in such a hurry. I'm amazed that when I wear them daily the fire AND the pain is not present. So glad my doc recommended this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: Really helps to reduce pain when I wear them during the day. If play tennis Without them, my left foots bunting hurts afterwards. If I use them during my practice or match, no pain when I’m done.
customer_reviews.author: Byron

customer_reviews.title: Good for short term use
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband who has a rather significant bunion which has been there for years. He said at first it was awesome and even provided instant relief for a painful planters wart on the ball of the same foot. However, after wearing it for a few hours he said it became very uncomfortable. He was wearing it with sneakers on a day where he was walking around quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Picasso

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but can tear
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 pairs. Why? It fits well and is very comfortable in shoes. But after a month the thin part that covers the bunion tore away. Good thing it it still works as the molded part still fits snugly between my toes. So i have not had to use the other 2 new ones that i have as back up. I am happy with his product. The tear is no big deal..to me
customer_reviews.author: Fadetogrey

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work inside my shoes
customer_reviews.text: This would be okay except I bought it to wear inside my shoes during the day. I can't do that as it makes my toes spread too wide and causes my shoe to be unbearably tight and uncomfortable. Not sure, now that I've tried it, that any would work for me in shoes because I do have wide enough toes as it is.
customer_reviews.author: Ozarks1

customer_reviews.title: Nice and soft, Happy wife happy life
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by her foot doctor. Ordered it on Amazon and it came to her three days later. Nice and soft. Use on either left or right foot. Since it is soft they do wear out. But at the price point that it is, he can afford to replace them as needed. Does the job for my wife and she is happy so I am also.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did the opposite of help
customer_reviews.text: This product did the opposite of help. While the material was stretchy and soft to the touch, that was not the case when worn. While trying on, in the 15 minutes I had this on my foot, the product was digging into my toes causing more pain than the injury that made me buy this is the first place. When I took off the product I had an indented ring around my big toe that was a burgundy color and was in a lot of pain. I don't know if this was due to the size of my feet (men's 12) or the product but I would not recommend this to someone based off my experience.
customer_reviews.author: M.T.D

customer_reviews.title: Work well and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These are easy on, even when wearing a sock over them and they do stay in place. Pro-tip: light dusting of talc or foot powder on your toe, then slip this on and lastly your sock. Be aware though, they're not for long shifts until you get used to them - they can cause blisters.
customer_reviews.author: Running Green Lights

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: This broke the 2nd time I wore it and I found it uncomfortable . There are 2 in a package but I don't even want to use the 2nd one because the first one was so disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: alma

customer_reviews.title: Had problems with these
customer_reviews.text: These were super comfortable, however, I wanted to wear them at night. Unfortunately, they seemed to get caught and stick on the sheets. Very comfortable, however,. just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: JKinSC

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: If you ware for too long it runs on the other toes. I would prefer if the space was a little more thicker. Item does what it is supposed to do and it helped. I wore with socks in my shoes and I didnt have a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Corinth Williams

customer_reviews.title: Work limited
customer_reviews.text: The product is very soft and it works very limited, it doesn’t fit like the pictures at all
customer_reviews.author: Ting

customer_reviews.title: A”must have” after bunion surgery!
customer_reviews.text: These toe separators with gel tabs are just like the ones the surgeon gave me and told me to wear after my bunion surgery. I love that they protect the scar enabling it to heal and protecting it from my shoes or socks from rubbing on the scar. If you’ve had bunion surgery, these are a must!
customer_reviews.author: A. Fulton

customer_reviews.title: As advertised, fast ship, excellent packaging
customer_reviews.text: Exactly like ones we’ve ordered before. My daughter wears these while en pointe. Great product and REALLY helps—they do wear our eventually however, so need to be replaced occasionally. Seller is great at communication, fast ship, excellent packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Gumbysgal

customer_reviews.title: Ouch no more
customer_reviews.text: My daughter told me that this product really helped relieve her bunion pain.
customer_reviews.author: Denise L

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Helpful and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd time ordering these because I use them every single day and on for my workouts. They have helped tremendously with pain and discomfort. I like how they are not bulky and move with your foot and shoes. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: bunion pad
customer_reviews.text: works well the bunion pad does what it is supposed to what more could you ask for
customer_reviews.author: jackster

customer_reviews.title: Same product?
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if these are the same ones I previously ordered. The packaging and color are different, and they seem a little less substantial in quality. These were made in China, and shipped from the Phillipines (!) took 17 days to arrive. My original pair (I lost them) were helpful, especially at night keeping toes separated. I'll have to get back with a report after I have used these a while.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: NatraCure Gel Toe separators
customer_reviews.text: Want to use the toe spreaders longer before making a final decision. They are soft which is great. When using the toe spreaders I feel a better blood circulation through the large toe area. I like that it attaches to the large toe so the separator holds in place. Don't know if it will help to bring the large toe back to correct place, need time to see if this works.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer crum

customer_reviews.title: Bunion Guard and Toe Spreader
customer_reviews.text: I like these because you can wear them inside some of your roomy shoes. They’re also very soft and comfortable. They are not bunion correctors, but bunion relief. I would definitely order them again.
customer_reviews.author: Tiptoe

customer_reviews.title: Discomfort After Few Days of Consistent Wearing
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love these. But I have had the worst pain on the bottoms of my feet and between my big toe and toe next to it since a few days after wearing them. I did not have the same problem as other reviews, where I couldn't get it to stay in place in my shoes. They did fine with that. But the pain on the pads of my feet alone are making it so I cannot wear them.
customer_reviews.author: KFG

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Bunion on right big toe. This product eases the pain and makes wearing shoes more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Newall

customer_reviews.title: Much better than stick on pads
customer_reviews.text: My 96 year old mother used to use bunion pads that stuck on with adhesive and her thin skin would tear when they were pulled off. She loves these. They're very comfortable and give her the exact padding she needs. Plus they are so much more cost effective than the throwaways.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Haviland

customer_reviews.title: It helped a little
customer_reviews.text: I could wear with shoes, so major plus! It is comfortable. Didn't help with pain as much as I would have liked, but that might just be me. It did help!
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Life changer
customer_reviews.text: My toe had been hurting for years, and this device took away my pain in a very short time.
customer_reviews.author: Форест лес

customer_reviews.title: More comfortable than others I've tried...
customer_reviews.text: I just noticed the forming of bunions by both of my big toes. Although my bunions have not yet caused me pain, I began wearing different types of toe separators as I intend to continue working out in the gym and didn't want them to get worse. I have small feet (women size 6) and this is the only one that didn't hurt when I wear them with socks (with some baby powder inside). I like it so much that I ordered another pair as back up.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Good product but ripped fast
customer_reviews.text: It was great but when I wore it for 10 hours the rubber ripped even if it was not strained. I bought 2 so using the other one now but didn't expect this to break that fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I was kind of skeptical about this product. However, one day, I noticed the pain was gone!! So this product fixed my problem.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Lin

customer_reviews.title: Not really helpful...
customer_reviews.text: It keeps the hallux and the long toe separated, but the side that’s suppose to cover the actually bunion is terrible and doesn’t stay.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Sabbat

customer_reviews.title: Finally comfort!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for years for a product that would provide comfort for my big toe that is deformed such that it brings the adjacent toe up and over the large toe. Most devices held down the smaller toe and that created its own discomfort. This product actually separates the toes without any added pressure to either toe. Very soft and very easy to use. I would strongly recommend this product to anyone that has a similar issue with deformed toes.
customer_reviews.author: Raiman

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Has tremendously helped my husband at work all day long in working boots. His feet do not hurt as bad as they did before starting wearing this product.
customer_reviews.author: A. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Good product but needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: The product is OK. It does what it is supposed to, however, the flap on the side is flimsy, bunches up too easily and should be broader and thicker. That would make the product protect the dorsal as well as lateral aspect of the bunion.
customer_reviews.author: Dshomette

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: Product works great! Like having the dual feature of space & bunion cover.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps tremendously with my husband's feet issues
customer_reviews.text: Arrived early and my husband is using it now. It relieves his pain issues with the big toe crushing against the other toe. Glad he could find relief.
customer_reviews.author: M.S.

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay put in a sneaker or shoe
customer_reviews.text: No way to support product on side of foot. Ok to wear for an hour with feet up, other than that... get a product that stays on your foot/toe in stead of outside area flopping around. Does not stay put in a shoe.
customer_reviews.author: L.C Roswell, GA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product .I j received it today,,. it’s extremely comfortable soft and fits with my shoes.. I will be able leave it on all day . Nice alignment .. been looking for product like this for a long time.. .Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Good value for quantity
customer_reviews.text: So much cheaper than buying at the store, works well in relieving pain, make sure to keep them powdered as they get funky otherwise
customer_reviews.author: Delano J

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love this things, they have helped my feet so much
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worn with the right shoes, inflammation of my bunion is extremely rare now.
customer_reviews.author: Michael McGarrett

customer_reviews.title: How much support the items gives.
customer_reviews.text: The toe guards do not fit well, too big. The elastic is too loose or they are too big. The toe separator is too small. No support unless the are connected all the way across the foot. The Bunion Guards fits well.
customer_reviews.author: zinnie

customer_reviews.title: Good relief
customer_reviews.text: Works good with padding to aid protecting the outside of the joint. Comfortable soft gel that you forget that you have them on.
customer_reviews.author: BFWJR

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea
customer_reviews.text: Great concept but rubber is too soft. 1st broke after 2night, the other broke on day 3. I wore it at night with socks but the material breaks too easy
customer_reviews.author: ADoug

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I have had no more pain from my bunion since the day I began wearing the bunion guard almost two weeks ago. I am pleasantly surprised that a product so inexpensive could bring instant and complete relief.
customer_reviews.author: john tapley

customer_reviews.title: Instant Relief!
customer_reviews.text: Instantly relieved the pain when I walk in my shoes. Advise to put some petroleum jelly between toes before putting them on, it makes it feel more natural for me. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Edwin H Guillaume

customer_reviews.title: relieved my foot pain
customer_reviews.text: Bought product to reduce bunion and big toe pain when wearing shoes. Big toe Bunion guard & toe spreader definitely did the job. The all -in-one design replaces the single toe spreader and separate bandaid I had been using. Plan to order more!
customer_reviews.author: dani

customer_reviews.title: Works. Helps
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful. My bunion is much easier to live with. This takes the pain completely away
customer_reviews.author: C. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: They are squishy and comfortable, and gently support your toe(s).
customer_reviews.text: I used these for a musical that I had to do a lot of dancing in heels for. Whenever I have to use heeled dance shoes or character shoes in particular, I always have a lot of pain while wearing them and after I take them off. These guards helped relieve that pain. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: so good.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these on the recommendation of my podiatrist. I wanted something that would keep my big toe a little straighter to lessen a tendency toward calluses and blisters. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: TheGreatOutdoors

customer_reviews.title: Softer and more r e comfortable than I imagined
customer_reviews.text: Softer and more r e comfortable than I imagined. For my bunion, need an even wider spacer and something around the second toe to keep the separator from shifting as I walk.
customer_reviews.author: Smitty

customer_reviews.title: Too skinny and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't separate toes enough and flips up easily. No grip. Better to get a wrap around kind to help position toe better.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hargis-manfredi

customer_reviews.title: Second purchase
customer_reviews.text: Second time for me buying this product. Helps with my foot pain along with the metatarsal cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Effective and great value.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, stays in place, very very comfortable, soft and light. Really works to relieve pressure and prevents development of bunion. Great value. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Z.

customer_reviews.title: Confused
customer_reviews.text: I just received them but it’s just one pack which has 2 inside. I thought it’ll be 2 pack 4 pieces. I haven’t worn them long yet. Just opened ded my package.
customer_reviews.author: Hani

customer_reviews.title: Love the material
customer_reviews.text: Love the material. Very comfortable. The toe separator could be slightly thinner. Has helped a lot. Can wear comfortably with most shoes
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Pushed Toes over Even More/Very Soft
customer_reviews.text: The seperator is very soft on the bunion and doesnt really work for me. It basically pushed my toes over to the side even more. the spacer is ok but i am using it on my middle toe so i will not be able to wear shoes with it. I wouldnt order again, Will order a better another that spaces both toes
customer_reviews.author: KHALISA

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable way to stop the bunion from getting worse.
customer_reviews.text: I can put this on and work all day with it on without a problem. Not a fan of any surgery so as long as this is part of the cure I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L. Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Great for walking
customer_reviews.text: I have very bad bunions. This product really relieves pressure on my toes.
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Happy Toes
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, easy to insert. Slowly working on my squashed toes.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Give em a try
customer_reviews.text: Not the best but I wanted to try it... comfort alone is okay but with shoe is a no go.. my bunions just may be too advanced for these :/
customer_reviews.author: Angela Christianson

customer_reviews.title: These are easy to wear and are very comfortable with a sneaker.
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to wear and are very comfortable with a sneaker.
customer_reviews.author: Creativity658

customer_reviews.title: Good protection
customer_reviews.text: This product does what it's supposed to: It separates my toes and pads the joint. I will definitely order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Gerri Kobren

customer_reviews.title: Foot comfort
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife she likes and uses it , their fore i know what she said is true
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more toe pain!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Comfortable and has helped so much with my toe pain.
customer_reviews.author: Enjoli Casiano

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered promptly. They work quite well in helping me have less pain with my bunions. Very comfortable. Do recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: Gel big toe guard and toe spreader
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. It is easy to wear during the day with tennis shoes.
customer_reviews.author: jolo

customer_reviews.title: Product  exactly as described online.
customer_reviews.text: I used two separate pieces....bunion pad and toe spacer. Having all in one piece is better. I don't believe anything is going to relieve my pain at this point but this product helps.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Bello

customer_reviews.title: Not So Good
customer_reviews.text: Actually TOO soft. Not enough strength/support to keep toes separated.
customer_reviews.author: Marie S. Pencosky

customer_reviews.title: worked but not well
customer_reviews.text: Clumsy fit. took up too much foot room in shoe.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!! Couldn't find any anywhere this is exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.author: juaquina

customer_reviews.title: Stays in place and protects painful bunion area
customer_reviews.text: First to space that I have used that stayed in place. Soft silicone protects painful bunion area from further irritation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Degree of toe separator aggressive...should be reduced.
customer_reviews.text: Ironically, the feature that attracted me to the item is the one I like the least. The bunion protector creates discomfort after wear. Not quite sure but I think it moved and created friction. My feet were red. The degree of separation is also aggressive and caused some pain a well. Not a good solution for me.
customer_reviews.author: Maria V.

customer_reviews.title: Bunion help!
customer_reviews.text: Helps my moderate bunion situation. The material is soft enough to not cause problems with socks & shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Kraus

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to wear and good for pain
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been using them long, but I'm pleased so far. They don't do so well in higher heeled shoes, but that's probably for the best haha. I have mild bunion pain, so I hoped to alleviate it and possibly correct the misalignment, and after a week I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Justique

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable treatment
customer_reviews.text: This fits comfortably and provides the support needed for the toe. The pain is going away, and I can see a realignment of the toe.
customer_reviews.author: Miss P.

customer_reviews.title: Good for their price
customer_reviews.text: Good at what it is supposed to do. Maintains the toes separated. Comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Rascon

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product to help with deminishing the pain but it shifts significantly and it is really flimsy. If you are looking for something with a little stiffness this is not it
customer_reviews.author: Jo Sam

product_meta.title: NatraCure Gel Big Toe Bunion Guards & Toe Spreaders (2 Pieces) - Pain Relief for Crooked, Overlapping Toes, Pressure, Protector, Corrector, Shield, Spacer, Pad, Separator, Cushion - 1315-M CAT 2PK
feature_bullets: INSTANT BUNION RELIEF: Helps ease bunion pain by reducing friction, irritation, and pressure on bunion joint with luxuriously cushy gel design.
TOE SPREADER: Alleviates and re-aligns overlapping, crooked toes. Separates the first and second toes to quickly eliminate rubbing and discomfort.
NOURISHES SKIN: Innovative M2 Gel slowly releases medical-grade mineral oil, Vitamin E, and Aloe Vera to moisturize, nourish, and protect the skin.
EASY & COMFORTABLE: Just slip over the hallux toe. Fits inside shoes and is comfortable enough to wear all day. Fits either left or right foot. One size fits most.
DOCTOR RECOMMENDED: Patent Pending design provides the ideal protection between the Hallux toe and your shoe. Hypoallergenic. Odorless. Washable & reusable. Proprietary Gel Formula made in the USA.
